40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin 'Amr:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "What befell the children of Isra'il will befall my Ummah, step by step, such that if there was one who had intercourse with his mother in the open, then there would be someone from my Ummah who would do that. Indeed the children of Isra'il split into seventy-two sects, and my Ummah will split into seventy-three sects. All of them are in the Fire Except one sect." He said: "And which is it O Messenger of Allah?" He said: "What I am upon and my Companions

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي افْتِرَاقِ هَذِهِ الأُمَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Splitting That Will Occur In This Ummah
